Setting.Name: Number of partitions for k-fold cross-validation test

Comment.Text: Split the signal between LEFT and RIGHT stims
Measure connectivity for selected channels... ... extract coherence "spectrum" for each pair... ... filter to frequencies of interest, and average over those
Run the classifier trainer, stop the scenario when training is over
/!\ nb of pairs is equal to sum(all integers [1:(nbChannels-1)]) 1, 3, 6, 10, 15, 21, 28, 36, ... Scenario graph can quickly get messy !!
